channel.title: Searching for Answers
channel.description:
Hello, I'm average consumer looking to learn more about Whonix.
I have a few question.
1) Is Whonix free?
2) Is it the same as Windows 11?
4) Who made Whonix?
5) How does it work?
7) How do I run a virtualized Whonix system in a Mobian arm64 distro running on an arm64 Pine Phone Pro phone to route networking through a arm64 Whonix gateway while using another virtualized arm64 Phosh subsystem or Phosh Whonix Workstation (or do something similar) and what specific CLI commands would be needed to create this and is there a Phosh Whonix workstation I can download?
8) Does Whonix include any programs?
9) How can I be sure I'll like Whonix?
I didn't see the answers to these questions in the FAQ.

item.title: Searching for Answers
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
averageconsumer66:

Does Whonix include any programs?

Kicksecure – 4 Jan 22

Software

Software Recommendations by Kicksecure ™ for Encryption, E-Mail, IRC, Media-Player, Image Viewer, Screenshot Creator, Calculator, Office Suite and more

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for Answers
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
If it’s some complex question with lots of back/forth, please create separate forum threads for each.

averageconsumer66:

Is Whonix free?

Whonix – 9 Jan 22

Utilize Search Engines and Documentation

Avoid basic questions. Effective use of search engines. Utilizing extensive Whonix ™ documentation.

averageconsumer66:

Is it the same as Windows 11?

No.

averageconsumer66:

Who made Whonix?

Who Develops Whonix?

averageconsumer66:
  • How does it work?

How does Whonix work?

averageconsumer66:

How do I run a virtualized Whonix system in a Mobian arm64 distro running on an arm64 Pine Phone Pro phone to route networking through a arm64 Whonix gateway while using another virtualized arm64 Phosh subsystem or Phosh Whonix Workstation (or do something similar) and what specific CLI commands would be needed to create this and is there a Phosh Whonix workstation I can download?

arm support isn’t really advertised at this time. It might change in the future. If so, it would be pointed out on the Whonix Download page and probably even on the homepage.

Hope in the sky, FYI:

Whonix – 14 Apr 22

Existing Ports of and Porting Whonix ™ to other Architectures

Architecture specific packages in Whonix ™. "Special packages". Software maintained by third parties. Compiled software. Kernel modules. Shared objects. Tips on porting Whonix ™ to other platforms. "amd64" means Intel and AMD. Porting Simplicity.

averageconsumer66:

Does Whonix include any programs?

Yes.

averageconsumer66:

How can I be sure I’ll like Whonix?

Created a new VFAQ entry to answer that just now:
How can I be sure I’ll like Whonix ™?

Read full topic

item.description:
Hello, I’m average consumer looking to learn more about Whonix.

I have a few question.

  1. Is Whonix free?
